mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MIX.T_PERSTATUS,MIX2.C_PERSTATUS,S_PERSTATUS,M.M_NAME FROM (SELECT NVL(T_PERSTATUS,'NOINFO') T_PERSTATUS FROM TEACHER RIGHT OUTER JOIN DUAL ON T_NO=#{mNo}) MIX , ( SELECT NVL(C_PERSTATUS,'NOINFO') C_PERSTATUS FROM CLASS RIGHT OUTER JOIN DUAL ON T_NO=#{mNo}) MIX2,(SELECT NVL(S_PERSTATUS,'NOINFO') S_PERSTATUS FROM SPACE RIGHT OUTER JOIN DUAL ON H_NO=#{mNo}) S,(SELECT M_NAME FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE M_NO=#{mNo}) M
